column4: i dont understand how to add sources to the repos so i can also dload the source
can someone tell me how to also get the source to dload when i dload a package
i want to be able to download sources when i use synaptic to retrieve a package
i can turn the option to "-" or " " there is no "x" i can check on for sources
can someone tell me how to add sources so i can also retrieve those when i grab a package with synaptic
i just want to add sources...nothing hard
but cant figure it out
sooo....i would like to add source to the repos
use administration > software sources
Zeus yes i can get to that area
there should be a checkbox for source there
but the "check on" for install sources is only "-" or " "
i cant put a check there
Zeu, do you know what i mean
do you know what i mean
oh, try using sudo apt-get source package
so there is no way to check it on?
eh?  check what on
what you told me to
<_Zeus_> en1gma: there should be a checkbox for source there
no, i take that back.  try what i said.  sudo apt-get source package
ok thanks
so how would i tell apt-get to install the source also
